CustomField.description: to count the total number of members with the status = registered or accepted. had to adjust this formula to include accepted. after the formula was updated, I selected "Force a mass recalculation of the field" all of the fields updated automatically and the field changed back to "Automatic calculation"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically counts the total number of members with the status = registered or accepted
CustomField.label: Total Accepted
